topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54714cbd6368724155100200#post_54714cbd6368724155100200
In the words of Weird Al:

"If one day you happen to wake up
And find yourself in an existential quandary
Full of loathing and self-doubt
And wracked with the pain and isolation of your pitiful meaningless existence
At least you can take a small bit of comfort in knowing that
Somewhere out there in this crazy mixed-up universe of ours
There's still a little place

Called AAAAAAAAAAAAAALBUQUERQUE
